column4: I have desktop cube enabled, but when i view the cube it dont show the back 2 desktops, only the 2 directly visable. Is there any setting for this?
in compizconfig-settings-manager there are tons of options, i'm sure there's a set of options there that are right for you
been lookin for an hour or so cant find it :(
try paginating just columns instead of rows, and mess with transparency to get it to look how you want
